name: what is the web hosting
short_description:
If you are the fresher of the world create the web site maybe you will asking yourself "What is the web hosting". Now you're thinking and have some idea about web hosting but you're not sure. Let me explain to you it's very simple and easy to understand

Web hosting is the places store data used to display a website which is rented by a person or company. There are all different types of hosting options from very expensive commercial Web hosts to free Web hosts.

If you need to practice design web and find free web hosts please see at free web hosts http://whatisthewebhosting.com/free-web-hosts or if you're looking for a places to store your website I suggest you research at top 10 best hosting providers http://whatisthewebhosting.com/top-10-best-hosting-provider
